However, some cases result from new mutations in the gene and occur in people with no history of the disorder in their family.",GHR,Perry syndrome
What are the treatments for Perry syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Perry syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Perry Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Perry syndrome  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Major Depression  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Primary Alveolar Hypoventilation  - National Parkinson Foundation: Treatme
